title: Drawing, "Woman Counting Money and Man with Eye Shade; St.Paul and Three Men, Cartoons of Death of Ananias and St. Paul after Raphael Sanzio", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and dark ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Woman Counting Money and Man with Eye Shade; St.Paul and Three Men, Cartoons of Death of Ananias and St. Paul after Raphael Sanzio", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and dark ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1386.
